programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions>
</CsOptions> <CsInstruments> ;run this example in CsoundQt, a Csound editor that provides widgets ;make the Widgets-panel visible, by clicking the Widgets symbol in the menu or pressing (Alt+1).
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1 ; written by Andres Cabrera instr 1
kfreq invalue "freq" ; Quotes are needed here asig oscil 0.1, kfreq, 1 outs asig, asig
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> f 1 0 1024 10 1 ;sine i 1 0 300 ;play for 300 seconds e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
